text: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure is a 1989 American science fiction comedy movie directed by Stephen Herek and written by Chris Matheson and Ed Solomon. It stars Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, and George Carlin. Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure received generally positive reviews, and was a success at the box office. A sequel, Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey was released in July 1991. A third film, Bill & Ted Face the Music is in development and is scheduled to be released in August 2020. ==References== Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1989 science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Stephen Herek Category:Movies set in the 13th century Category:Movies set in the 15th century Category:Movies set in the 1800s Category:Movies set in the 1860s Category:Movies set in the 1870s Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies set in the 27th century Category:Movies set in Greece Category:Movies set in Mongolia Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Vienna Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
